title: Aaron Rodgers wishes 'Bachelorette' suitor brother well
paragraphs: Aaron Rodgers is happy to talk football, but “The Bachelorette” not so much.
Jordan Rodgers, brother of the Green Bay Packers quarterback, is one of two final suitors vying for the hand of Texas real estate developer Joelle “JoJo” Fletcher on the ABC reality series.
On the show Jordan Rodgers said he and his family are estranged from his brother.
Aaron Rodgers family feud? Brother claims they’re estranged
When asked about it Tuesday during training camp, Aaron Rodgers told CNN affiliate WISN-TV in Milwaukee he’s not a fan.
“I haven’t seen the show, to be honest with you, so it hasn’t really affected me a whole lot,” he said.
As for whether or not he is in contact with his family, the athlete declined to comment, but he wished his brother luck.

“As far as those kinds of things go, I’ve always found that it’s a little inappropriate to talk publicly about some family matters, so I’m just – I’m not going to speak on those things, but I wish him well in the competition,” he said.
